japanese:
はあ……。
やっぱりこのままじゃダメです……。
translation:
*sigh*
I can't continue on like this after all...

japanese: 何がダメだって？
translation: What's wrong?

japanese:
きゃあ！？
う、うう、上杉君！？
translation:
EEEEP?!
U-U-U-UESUGI-KUN?!

japanese:
そんなに驚くことないだろ、
普通に声をかけただけなのに。
translation:
You don't need to be so surprised.
All I did was talk to you.

japanese:
それよりダメってなんだ？
何か問題が起きたのか？
translation:
What do you mean, you can't continue on?
Did something happen?

japanese: い、いえ別になにも！　なにもありませんよ！
translation:
N-no, nothing at all!
Nothing happened at all!

japanese: あからさまに怪しい。
translation: You're being blatantly suspicious.

japanese: うっ……。
translation: Ooh...

japanese:
ここでの生活じゃ、１つの小さな問題が
命に関わることに発展する可能性だってあるんだ。
translation:
Living here like this, one small problem
can develop into something life-threatening.

japanese: 大丈夫です、その心配はありません。
translation: I'm JUST fine, you don't need to worry.

japanese:
ダメだ、１人の判断じゃ認識不足なこともある。
とにかく言ってみろ。
translation:
Nope.
Sometimes one person's assessment
isn't enough to tell. Just say it.

japanese:
わかりました！　言えばいいんですね！
実は、ふ、ふ、ふ……！
translation:
I understand! I should say it, I get it!
Truthfully, I think I've gotten f-f-f...!

japanese: ふ？
translation: F?

japanese: 太ってしまったと思ったんです！
translation: I think I've gotten FAT!

japanese:
いや別にそんなことはないだろ。
見た目には変わってないぞ
実に健康的でいいじゃないかはははは。
translation:
No, that doesn't seem true.
You don't look any different.
You're the picture of health, aren't you, hahahaha.

japanese: 言葉に心がこもっていませんが。
translation: I feel your heart isn't behind your words.

japanese: ……すまん。
translation: ...Sorry.

japanese:
はあ……。
本当にあなたという人は……。
translation:
*sigh*
Really, you're always like this...

japanese:
いや、しかしだな、
本当に太っているようには見えないぞ？
多少太っていても気にする必要はないだろ。
translation:
No, but actually, you really don't look like
you've gotten fat at all, ya know? If you've gotten
a little fat, though, you don't need to worry.

japanese: そんなに連呼しないでくださいっ！
translation: Please stop calling me that!

japanese:
別に、本当に……
体重が増えてしまったのかはわかりませんが――
translation:
No, really...
I don't know if I've gained weight or not, but%p-2;――

japanese:
小さい声になったのはせめてもの抵抗か。
無駄なことを。
translation:
Don't try lowering your voice just because 
you're not feeling confident.
It's pointless.

japanese:
わかってます！
いちいち指摘しないでください！
translation:
I understand that!
You don't have to point out every little thing!

japanese:
とにかくですね、島に来てから
日課の運動をあまりしていないので
心配になったんです。
translation:
Anyway, I've been worried,
because I haven't done my daily exercise 
routine since we came to the island.

japanese: つまりサボっているわけか。
translation: So, you're skipping them?

japanese:
サボったつもりは。
精神的に余裕がなかったんです。
translation:
I didn't mean to skip them.
It's because I didn't have the willpower.

japanese:
ふーむ、だったら誰かが見張っていれば
サボることもなくなるんじゃないか？
translation:
Hmm, so if someone is watching over you,
you won't skip your exercises, eh?

japanese: え？
translation: Huh?

japanese: あの、本当にやれというのですか？
translation: Um, are you really telling me to exercise?

japanese:
着替えまでしておいてやらない気か？
ちゃんと見ててやるから。
translation:
You even changed your clothes and 
you're still not in the right mood?
I'll take over from here.

japanese: はあ……。
translation: *sigh*

japanese: で？　日課の運動って何をやるんだ？
translation: And? What do you do for your daily routine?

japanese: 腹筋運動やヨガです。
translation: Abdominal exercises and yoga.

japanese: よし、じゃあまずは腹筋からだ！
translation: Right, start with those abdominal exercises!

japanese: どうしてあなたが仕切っているんですか。
translation: Why exactly are you in charge?

japanese: では、始めます。
translation: Alright, I'll begin.

japanese: ふうううう……！
translation: FUUUU...!

japanese:
全然体が上がってないぞ！
もっと力を込めていけ！
translation:
You're not getting off the ground at all!
Put more power into it!

japanese: ううううう～！
translation: OOOOOHH!

japanese:
おいおい、それで本気なのか？
サボって筋力が落ちているようだな！
translation:
Hey hey, are you really giving it your best?
It looks like you've lost muscle 
strength from slacking off!

japanese: ぬうううう～！
translation: NUUUU!

japanese:
お！　いいぞいいぞ少し上がってきた！
その意気だっ！
translation:
Oh! Good, good, you lifted up a little!
Just like that!

japanese: ふぬううう～！
translation: FNNUUU!

japanese: も、もう無理ですぅ～！
translation: I-I can't do it anymooore!

japanese:
何を甘えてるんだ！
さあ、もう一度だ、お前の根性を見せてみろ！
translation:
What are you being all soft for?!
Right, one more time, show me those guts!

japanese:
もういいですっ！
あなたに見張られていると落ち着きません！
translation:
I'm finished!
I can't relax with you watching me!

japanese:
そう言ってサボる気か？
怠慢は許せん！
translation:
So you're gonna say that, and skip your exercises?
Quitting will not be tolerated!

japanese:
勉強以外のこんなところまで
あなたのお世話になる気はありませんっ！
出ていってください！
translation:
I don't want you to take care of me like this
except for when we're studying!
Now, please get out!

japanese: （……ちょっと調子に乗りすぎてしまったか）
translation: (...I might have gone a little too far.)
